description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a profile page, serving as a placeholder for user account information and sign-in/out actions. It includes UI elements like ListView, Card, ListTile, Buttons, and text, with comments indicating future Firebase Auth integration.

classes.name: ProfilePage
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the user profile screen with placeholder content.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the profile page, displaying user info placeholder, action buttons, and informational text.
